content: Subhash Khot Subhash Khot Silver Professor Computer Science Department Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences New York University New York, NY-10012 � [Contact] [Publications] I am a Professor in the Computer Science Department at New York University, part of the Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences. This is an acknowledgement of my indebtedness, in many ways, to Jim Simons, who passed away recently. Previous affiliations: 1999-2003: PhD at Princeton CS Department under the supervision of Prof. Sanjeev Arora . 2003-2004: Member of School of Mathematics , IAS. 2004-2007: Assistant Professor at the College of Computing at Georgia Tech. 2007-2011: Associate Professor at NYU. 2011-2013: Visiting faculty at U.Chicago with the theory group. 1995-1999: B.Tech. at Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay.
